INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* This would be my third year participating.  I've had the chance to be with two different sectors, which has given me an array of opportunities to learn, be curious, and make connections throughout the state. I am open to new experiences and look forward to bringing a positive attitude, combined with hard work, in each aspect of this externship. The education and skills I get to learn and/or work on, helps me serve my students, families, and staff more effectively. For me, it's easy to understand why I keep coming back!
